codeVerification.subheader.otp: Enter the verification code from your authenticator app.
codeVerification.subheader.sms: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your phone.
codeVerification.subheader.sms.firstTime: To complete your enrollment, enter the code we sent to your mobile phone number.
codeVerification.footer.useRecoveryCode: Sign in with your recovery code
enrollmentComplete.subheader: You’re all set. In the future, you’ll need your mobile phone to sign in.
identityVerified.subheader: Redirecting you back to where you came from.
logInWithRecoveryCode.subheader: Enter your one-time recovery code, and we’ll generate a new one once you’ve signed in.
logInWithRecoveryCode.footer.supportPhon: Having Trouble? Contact our support at: +1 (312) 424 4288.
newRecoveryCode.subheader: To sign in without your device, save this one-time code. Write it down and keep it somewhere safe for future use.
newRecoveryCode.recordCodeCheckbox: I saved this code for future use
sessionExpired.subheader: Either your login attempt took too long or an error has occurred. For your security, please refresh this page and try again.
userEnrollment.subheader.sms: For your security, Morningstar requires you to verify your identity. Enter your mobile phone number, and we’ll send you a code via SMS.
userEnrollment.subheader.otp: For your security, Morningstar requires you to verify your identity. Scan this QR code with an authenticator app, like Microsoft Authenticator or Google Authenticator, and then enter the code from the app.
userEnrollment.footer.authenticator: I’d rather use an authenticator app.
error.generic.support: Please try again. If this issue persists, please reach out to our support at: +1 (312) 424 4288.
error.phone.smsLimit.title: SMS limit exceeded
error.phone.smsLimit.text: Please try again later, or contact our support at: +1 (312) 424 4288
error.phone.input: Please enter a valid phone number.
error.phone.invalid: We weren’t able to verify your phone number, please try again.
